SELECT OD_JRY_GAISAN.OD_JRY_GAISAN_ID , OD_JRY_GAISAN.OD_JRY_ID , OD_JRY_GAISAN.AMOUNT , OD_JRY_GAISAN.BIKOU , OD_JRY_GAISAN.SEND_FLAG , OD_JRY_GAISAN.VESSEL_ID , OD_JRY_GAISAN.DATA_NO , OD_JRY_GAISAN.USER_KEY , OD_JRY_GAISAN.RENEW_DATE , OD_JRY_GAISAN.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_JRY_GAISAN.TS
FROM OD_JRY_GAISAN
WHERE OD_JRY_GAISAN.CANCEL_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO OD_JRY_GAISAN ( OD_JRY_GAISAN_ID , OD_JRY_ID , AMOUNT , BIKOU , CANCEL_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :OD_JRY_GAISAN_ID , :OD_JRY_ID , :AMOUNT , :BIKOU , :CANCEL_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE OD_JRY_GAISAN SET OD_JRY_ID = :OD_JRY_ID , AMOUNT = :AMOUNT , BIKOU = :BIKOU , CANCEL_FLAG = :CANCEL_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE OD_JRY_GAISAN_ID = :OD_JRY_GAISAN_ID AND TS = :TS
